column2: It has the visual element of the image gallery but with the context of the video so I could understand more about what I was looking at in the image
column4: I had no way to confirm what it was saying it was true I just had to trust the AI completely
column6: Scrubbing through the video even at 8x speed and keeping all of the questions and information in your head is difficult. If the task is to quickly answer specific questions reducing the cognitive load through the AI tools be pre-filtering out the extra dead air is helpful.
